content: Heart of Stone is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Heart_of_Stone.md', within the main section titled 'Heart of Stone'.
The content is as follows:
Heart of Stone is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
